name: Magnifistorming Crothea
text: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while your opponent controls no Spells/Traps. You can only use each of the following effects of "Magnifistorming Crothea" once per turn. If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Magnifistorm" card and/or 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck and/or GY to your hand, except "Magnifistorming Crothea", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except WIND monsters.
